name: Operator Motifs
pages: Operators modify the $(l:essence_of_harmony:spells/spell_works)stack$(/l) that is imprinted somewhere.. and is unique for every player.

pages.title: Mirror Motif
pages.text: outputs you, the caster, onto the stack as an entity symbol.$(br2)$(1)$(l)C, E, G, E $()$(1)$(br)[] -> [entity] operator$(br)$(2)will always execute.

pages.title: Placement Motif
pages.text: inputs an entity, and outputs the location of that entity.$(br2)$(1)$(l)B, E, G, E  $()$(1)$(br)[entity] -> [vector] operator$(br)$(2)will always execute.

pages.title: Guide Motif
pages.text: inputs an entity, and outputs the direction that entity is facing.$(br2)$(1)$(l)D, F, A, F $()$(1)$(br)[entity] -> [vector] operator$(br)$(2)will always execute.

pages.title: Block-Clip Motif
pages.text: Use the essence of the world to cast a line through space; where does that line hit a block, or end? Has a base range of 20 blocks. Input a location, then direction, and outputs a location.$(br2)$(1)$(l)C, E, G, F, G, D, G, D $()$(1)$(br)[vector, vector] -> [vector] operator$(br)$(2)will always execute.

pages.title: Stack Wipe Motif
pages.text: Clears the entire stack.$(br2)$(1)$(l)G, E, D, E, C $()$(1)$(br)[ ... ] -> [] operator$(br)$(2)will always execute.
